description: It's easy to cook the best pork belly and crispy pork crackling in an air fryer with this recipe. Balance the pork perfectly with our fresh mandarin salad.
name: Air-Fryer Crispy Pork Belly With Mandarin Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 mandarins, peeled, cut crossways thickly sliced
0.5 red onion, thinly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat air fryer to 200°C. Pat pork dry with paper towels. Rub salt flakes into rind. Line air-fryer basket with foil. Place pork belly, skin-side up, in basket and cook for 30 minutes or until skin is crisp. Reduce heat to 160°C and cook for a further 20 minutes or until pork is cooked through. Rest for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine mustard, honey, vinegar and oil in a small bowl.
Just before serving, toss mandarin, rocket, onion and fennel in a large bowl. Serve sliced pork with salad drizzled with mustard dressing
